title: your friend's gift pool is not large enough to receive a mystery gift
body:
Hey people. 

trying to give a friend Xayah. but for some reason i get "your friend's gift pool is not large enough to receive a mystery gift"
he has been my friend for over a year. not perma banned or anything like that. he has more than 10 champions and more than 10 skins. he is level 30

Please help

FOLLOW UP - he was able to give me Rakan with no problems

replies.body: Thanks for the report!  This gift pool error was happening because your friend already unlocked the champion on their own.  The messaging should have been more clear, but caused some confusion in this case.  Thanks for the details and letting us know about this!
U shud just gift me xayah. plez :D i can be ur friend :)

My friend doesn't have the new champ..has been my friend for 4 years has all the champs except the new ones.  My friend didn't{{champion:497}} 
 unlock it
My friend has been playing league the past four seasons, there is no way her gift pool is not large enough to get{{champion:498}}
same for me on EU server
